subject: saens removed from ftp.us.d.o (was: relevancy of saens as a member of ftp.us.d.o ?)
body:
On Wed, Apr 11, 2007 at 03:07:39PM +0200, Simon Paillard wrote:
> On Mon, Apr 09, 2007 at 06:27:09PM +0200, Simon Paillard wrote:
> > In short term, could we remove saens from the ftp.us.d.o round robin to
> > reduce the load on it, and mostly to allow users that choose ftp.us.d.o
> > to have a decent mirror ?
> 
> BTW, it also affects servers that mirrors from saens.d.o (or from
> ftp.us.d.o) like #418688 and thus prevent people from installing etch
> properly.

DSA has just removed saens from ftp.debian.org.

-- 
Simon Paillard


-- 
To UNSUBSCRIBE, email to debian-mirrors-REQUEST@lists.debian.org
with a subject of "unsubscribe". Trouble? Contact listmaster@lists.debian.org
